mapper.insert: insert into sys_organization (id, create_time, modify_time, version, status, name, parent_id, address, phone, post_code, fax, type, order_no, code, principal_id, path) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_organization set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_id = #{principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, modify_time, version, status, name, parent_id, address, phone, post_code, fax, type, order_no, code, principal_id, path from sys_organization where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, create_time, modify_time, version, status, name, parent_id _parentId, address, phone, post_code, fax, type, order_no, code, principal_id, path from sys_organization

select id, create_time, modify_time, version, status, name, parent_id _parentId, address, phone, post_code, fax, type, order_no, code, principal_id, path from sys_organization limit #{start} , #{rows};
